survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Ride-Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction levels with popular ride-sharing services, focusing on user experience, pricing, safety, and convenience factors.

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing service do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Consider including an 'Other' option with open-text follow-up to capture less common services.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing service do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select questions should be limited to 3 choices maximum to avoid cognitive overload.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes with max selection limit of 3

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the pricing of your most frequently used ride-sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced Likert scale with clear anchors for accurate measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons with 5-point scale

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the pricing of your most frequently used ride-sharing service?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using ride-sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Prefer not to say' option for sensitive questions.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using ride-sharing services?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to your primary ride-sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions should be placed near the end to avoid survey fatigue.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to your primary ride-sharing service?
